timeline.bodyHTML:
We can probably do the following, can you check?

Suggested change
Set<String> roles = null;
if (token.getRealmAccess() != null) {
roles = token.getRealmAccess().getRoles();
}
if (roles != null) {
allRoles.addAll(roles);
}
if (token.getRealmAccess() != null) {
allRoles.addAll(token.getRealmAccess());
}

timeline.bodyHTML:
Another possible variant, to avoid calling realmAccess.getRoles() twice in case it's costly (I don't know), is:

    Set<String> roles;
    if (realmAccess != null && (roles = realmAccess.getRoles()) != null) {
          allRoles.addAll(roles);
    }

Up to you if you want to change it.
